channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- JBossWS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- JBossWS

item.title: CVE-2011-2487|2024-08-06T23:00:33.988Z -- red%20hat -- jbossws
item.description: The implementations of PKCS#1 v1.5 key transport mechanism for XMLEncryption in JBossWS and Apache WSS4J before 1.6.5 is susceptible to a Bleichenbacher attack.
